price: 16. Hadday ku toosaan (dadku) Jidka (Islaamka) waxaan ka waraabin laheyn biyo badan (risiq wanaagsan).
arabic: وَأَلَّوِ ٱسۡتَقَٰمُواْ عَلَى ٱلطَّرِيقَةِ لَأَسۡقَيۡنَٰهُم مَّآءً غَدَقٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wa-allawi is'taqāmū ʿalā al-ṭarīqati la-asqaynāhum māan ghadaqan
translations: surely We (would) have given them to drink
